lines.text: So, this is your idea of a good night, huh. Get me drunk and then screw me.
Okay, okay, we'll get something to eat first.
We call her Turnpike, cuz you gotta pay to get on and pay to get off!
Now all you whores sit down. I wanna talk to you. Anybody thinking about leaving here is gonna find my left foot square up your ass! Do you understand that?
[Turnpike mumbles to Annette]

[yells at Turnpike]
Shut up, you junkie whore! I'm talkin' to you! And those two bitches that left, they'd better learn to sell pussy in Iceland because if I ever see them again, I'm gonna cut their fuckin' throats! We are family... and that's what we're gonna stay. Now I got important business out there today. And when I call you, I want you to come out there and shake your asses proper! You hear? HUH? Now get out there and make it look good! And Raquel, take that fuckin' jacket off! MOVE IT!

[referencing Taffy]
Her clients call her Colonel Sanders because she's finger lickin' good.
You Dorinda?
Who want to know?
Since I'm asking, it must be me.
Turner's like a bulldog with eyes up his ass!
You don't look like cops, but you smell like trouble.
Trouble, me? If I was, I wouldn't stand a chance with you, Mama.
You didn't get shit!
Just follow the bouncing ball, nigger.
Be cool, pussy.
Well Blue, I presume you came to talk business.
You dont see me with my cock in my hand, do you, Dorinda?
Who's he, you're test-tube?
He's looking in your house for tapes.
Shit nigger, this ain't the White House.
What's the matter, Blue? Can't you cut the job?
I am the job. I came here to get 'em off your ass!
My ass is in good shape.
Your ass is into hot water without a boat!
[Moments after he shot Reno dead, Truck and Annie head to Truck's apartment]
Truck, talk to me. Do you know him?
I told ya, I don't know him.
Well, then why were they shooting at us?
I don't know, but I'll find out. I'm gonna find out.
[Truck opens the door and, shocked, both he and Annie sees Harvard Blue on the couch cuddling Frances the cat. Annie screams and hides in front of Truck; Truck pulls out his revolver]

[to Annie]
Come on in. Come on, close the door.
[to Harvard]
What do ya want, man?
Checkin' you out, "man".
What is all this shootin' shit outside?

[Chuckles as he stands up]
The sky's about to open on your head. Better retire. Take a vacation. Lay on a beach for about 90 years.

[cocks hammer]
You've got ten seconds. One, two, three, four five, six, seven...

[leaves]
Be cool, pussy.
...eight.
Mac 'Truck' Turner!
You hurt?
No, I'm indestructible! Hey man, it looks like we get a bonus.
Yeah.

[the topless blonde storms out of Gator's hideout. Enraged, she stabs Jerry in the shoulder with a pair of scissors. Jerry collapses. Truck jumps off a garage and charges at the blonde, who backs away scared. Truck then knocks her out unconscious]
Bitch!

[back at Dorinda's compound following Gator's funeral]
Mama, you ain't gonna keep this shit together with Gator gone.

[smacks Taffy in the face, then grabs and pulls her to the floor]
Come here, you little black bitch!
[to Taffy]
But your ass belongs to me. I tell you what you can and can't do with it. Do you understand what I'm saying?

[crying]
I didn't say I was leavin'.
SHUT UP!
What do you want?
A bucket o' blood. I want the nigger that wasted Gator.
Dorinda, you're trying to piss standing up. You're gonna get a lot of people wet.

[Truck grabs a valuable statue of Desmond's]
Easy! That thing cost me a lot of zuzu's, you dig?
This ain't my year. Here's a pimp, patio full of whores.. I'm the one getting fucked... nah!
[smashes the statue]
Whatchu see ain't all you get baby. This ain't Sears Roebuck nigga.
Your ass belongs to me I tell you what you can and can't do with it. Do you understand what I'm saying to you?
[to someone talking]
Shut up! Now all you whores sit down I wanna talk to you. Anybody thinking about leaving here is gonna find my left foot square up their ass do you understand me?
[to someone else talking]

Shut up ya chunky whore. I'm talking to you. Those two bitches that left they better learn to sell pussy in Iceland because if I ever see them again I'm gonna cut their fucking throats. Hey! We are a family. And that's what we're gonna stay. Now I got important business out there today. So when I call you I want you to shake yo asses proper ya hear? HUH! Now get out there and make it look good. And Raquel take that fucking jacket off!

[yawns as he's getting dressed; to Frances, Annie's cat]
Oh, Frances. Frances, I've forgot to feed ya last night. I'm sorry about that.
[Truck looks in the mirror and finds that Frances peed on his shirt by a wet stain on his right side. Truck smells it and become cross]

[angry at Frances]
You pissed on my shirt! My last goddamned shirt. You fuck-ass son-of-a-bitch. Get your ass off of there!
[shoves Frances off his bureau]
I haven't had to sell my pussy since I was fifteen and found out I could sell other bitches' instead.
[Truck and Annie return from the hospital to see Truck's apartment ransacked by Harvard Blue's "insurance company" mob. Seconds later, they both see Annie's cat, Frances, hung to death]

[screams in horror; sobbing]
Truck, they got Frances! TRUCK, THEY GOT FRANCES!
Come on. Come on, there's nothing you can do for the cat.

[wails]
Truck...
Let's go. Let's get outta here.
[Truck grabs Annie and they leave the ransacked apartment]

[sobbing continues]
Oh, God! Oh!
[At Gator's hideout, the phone is ringing as Gator loads bullets into his gun]
Gator, aren't you gonna answer it?

[yells]
That's your job. Pick up that goddamn telephone, you dumb bitch!

[answers the phone]
Hello?
[to Gator]
I think it's for you.
For me? How the hell could it be for me?
[snatches the receiver]
Jive-ass broad. Speak! Hey man, what the hell you doing calling me here? You know better than to call me here!

[inside the phone booth with Truck]
Sorry, man. But... I've got some dynamite stuff here.
Yeah, but why are you calling me here?
I've got it, man! Understand?
Listen, is anybody with you?

[to the Druggist]
Tell him to let you in.
That's it, let me in.

[furious]
I'm gonna slit your throat, you jive-ass sucker! How much time do I got?
It's worse than that...

[takes the receiver and hangs up]
That's it.
But what about me?
What about you?
[Truck gives a karate kick to the druggist]
